mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.name, b.describe_msg AS describeMsg, b.module_id AS moduleId, b.attachment_id AS attachmentId, b.sort, b.title, b.keywords, b.description, b.alt, b.content, b.code, b.click_url AS clickUrl, b.create_by AS createBy, b.create_time AS createTime, b.update_by AS updateBy, b.update_time AS updateTime, a.filename AS fileName, a.filesize AS fileSize, a.filetype AS fileType, a.filepath AS filePath, a.file_id AS fileId FROM project b LEFT JOIN system_attachment a ON b.attachment_id=a.id WHERE b.module_id=#{moduleId} ORDER BY b.sort

SELECT b.id, b.name, b.describe_msg AS describeMsg, b.module_id AS moduleId, b.attachment_id AS attachmentId, b.sort, b.title, b.keywords, b.description, b.alt, b.content, b.code, b.click_url AS clickUrl, b.create_by AS createBy, b.create_time AS createTime, b.update_by AS updateBy, b.update_time AS updateTime FROM project b JOIN module m ON b.module_id=m.id AND m.belong='News'
WHERE b.id !=#{projectId} AND ( 1=0
OR b.keywords LIKE "%${item},%" OR b.keywords LIKE "%,${item}%"
